citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1145 on
15-Nov-17.
Inspectors knocked at house door with no answer, left message at phone on record, waited 30 minutes before
leaving facility.
